description: The purpose of these services is to augment capacity in the planning and execution of departmental program and strategic initiatives managed by the Health department on an as and when required basis.
full_summary:
====================================================================

**Business Analysts**
=====================

**Reference**: cb-4904-5629600

The Government of Canada invites proposals from qualified contractors to augment capacity in the planning and execution of departmental program and strategic initiatives. This procurement is seeking business analyst capacity and expertise on an as and when required basis to support various initiatives, including, but not limited to, the proposed Canadian Dental Care Plan.

**Procurement Details**
------------------------

*   **Procurement Category**: SRV
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive Selective Tendering
*   **Notice Type**: RFP against Supply Arrangement

**Bidder Information**
----------------------

*   **Contracting Entity**: Health Canada
*   **Contact Information**:
    *   Name: Eryn Mathers
    *   Email: < eryn.mathers@hc-sc.gc.ca>
    *   Phone: (613) 298-2804

**Tender Details**
------------------

*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-05-05T14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-06-01
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: 2026-03-31

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Attachments**
--------------

Tender documents and amendments are available for download at the following links:

*   English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4904/nnp-english-business-analysts-ta-april-19-2023.pdf>
*   English Amendment: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4904/nnp-english-business-analysts-t
